You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with a mix of X's and ▢'s, where the ▢'s form a shape that is not symmetrical and has some empty spaces in the middle.
